News.headline: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 22nd January
News.page_title: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 22nd January
News.URL_keywords: Sunday Football At The Daggers: 22nd January
News.short_description: Enjoy a packed Sunday of football at the Daggers Bar.
News.description:
Football Sundays will be back between 12:00-7:00pm on Sunday with three games from the Premier League being shown live on Sky Sports. At 12:00pm Southampton will be taking on current Premier League Champions Leicester City at St Mary's Stadium, then Arsenal will be taking on Burnley at the Emirates Stadium with a 14:15pm kick off, before Premier League leaders Chelsea will be taking on Hull City at 16:30pm, who will be hoping to get their second win on the bounce under new manager Marco Silva.

Take advantage of the Football Sundays offers on selected drinks at £2.49, which include; Carling, Cask Ale, Bottle Coors, Carling English Cider and Koppaberg. 

These offers are open to members only. Season ticket holders are automatically members but anyone wishing to buy a membership on the day can do so by asking a member of bar staff. So make sure you buy your membership for just £2!
